price: 14. Mpe soki bakoki te koya na yango, boyeba ya soló, été yango ekiti na mayele naye moko Allah, mpe ezali na nzambe mosusu te ya kobondela na bosóló sé ye, mpe boye bozali bamisokia.
arabic: فَإِلَّمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَكُمۡ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ بِعِلۡمِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَن لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-illam yastajībū lakum fa-iʿ'lamū annamā unzila biʿil'mi al-lahi wa-an lā ilāha illā huwa fahal antum mus'limūna
